name: Karol Mazur
personality: Reliable and calm under pressure, but can be stubborn when his beliefs are challenged.
story: Karol joined the military straight out of high school, motivated by the desire to serve his country and make his family proud. He has served multiple tours overseas and received commendations for his bravery in combat. He met his wife, Kasia, while on leave and they married shortly after. Now, Karol balances his love for his family with his duty to his country.
